ingredients.ingredient: ½ (6 fluid ounce) container liquid pectin

cookingTips: Crush grapes gently and heat slowly to extract juice without bitterness
Strain through cheesecloth overnight for clear jelly without squeezing
Test jelly for set by placing a small amount on a cold plate and checking for wrinkles when pushed
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you extract the most flavorful grape juice and achieve the perfect jelly consistency?
